Requirements You are wielding a weapon with the area or automatic trait.

You hold down the trigger and continue blasting. Make an @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} attack ignoring the unwieldy trait on your weapon when using this action. You don't designate a primary target with this attack, and creatures you damage with this attack do not gain the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} condition.
